mapper.insert: insert into choon_member(mno, mid, mpw, mname, mphone, memail) values(choon_member_seq.nextval, #{mid}, #{mpw}, #{mname}, #{mphone}, #{memail})
mapper.select: select pno, pcatname, pname, porgname, pml, palcohol, pprice, pdesc from product_info p, category c, origin o where p.pcategory = c.pcategory and p.porigin = o.porigin and pno = #{pno}
mapper.insert: insert into choon_cart(cno, mno, pno) values(choon_cart_seq.nextval, 1, #{pno})
mapper.select: select /*+index_desc(b SYS_C008119) index_desc(a product_pk)*/ a.pno, a.pname, a.pml, a.palcohol, a.pprice, b.cno from product_info a, choon_cart b where a.pno = b.pno and b.mno = #{mno}
select count(*) from choon_cart where mno = #{mno}
